explanation: Astronaut Bruce McCandless II made history in 1984 with the first untethered spacewalk, venturing about 100 meters from the Space Shuttle. | He utilized a Manned Maneuvering Unit (MMU) that propelled him through space using jets of nitrogen. | This groundbreaking MMU allowed astronauts to freely move for tasks like deploying and retrieving satellites, though it was later replaced by the SAFER backpack.
